Class BossTwo

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.Group
com.example.demo.actors.Actor.Actor
com.example.demo.actors.Actor.BossTwo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BossTwo extends Actor
Represents the second boss in the game, featuring shooting, movement, animations, and health management. Extends Actor to inherit basic actor properties and behavior.

  • Property Summary
